*** Settings ***
Library           CodeLibWrapper.py

*** Keywords ***
KW_Config_ReadEnvironmentParameter
    [Arguments]    ${ConfigFilePath}    ${EnvironmentName}    ${ParameterName}
    [Documentation]    Read parameter value from Configuration xml by environment name and parameter name.
    ${ParameterValue}    Config Get Parametervalue By Name And Environment    ${ConfigFilePath}    ${EnvironmentName}    ${ParameterName}
    [Return]    ${ParameterValue}
